item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

                                              }
                                                if(misc.random(50) == 1694) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Sellin mod admin or co for a lvl 50-55 rs acc";
                                                }

Put this with all the other NPC codes in npchandler.java.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Add this to your NPChandler.java,

                                              }
                                                if(misc.random(50) == NPCID) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "This is where you put your phrase";
                                                }

Put it with the rest of the NPC talking codes. (Around the top-center of the document.)

Read full topic
